main.name: Chau Ka Leung (Jeremy)
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hello, i am an experienced web developer with a strong focus on JavaScript and MySQL. Over the course of six years, I have honed my skills in full-stack website development and content management systems (CMS). My expertise spans both front-end and back-end development, enabling me to create user-friendly interfaces and optimize databases for seamless performance. I take great pride in writing clean and efficient code, ensuring visually appealing and flawlessly functioning websites. Collaboration and effective communication are central to my work philosophy, as I actively engage with clients to understand their unique requirements and translate their vision into fully functional websites that exceed expectations.
main.address: F Flat, 18/F, Block 8 Bauhinia Garden 11 Tong Chun Street, Tseung Kwan O, NT, HK

education.school: HKTA The Yuen Yuen Institute No.3 Secondary School
